text:
INFO: The Apache Tomcat Native library which allows optimal performance in produ
ction environments was not found on the java.library.path: C:\Program Files\Java
\jre1.5.0\bin;.;C:\WINNT\system32;C:\WINNT;D:\oracle\ora81\bin;C:\WINNT\system32
;C:\WINNT;C:\WINNT\System32\Wbem;D:\Tomcat-5.5.15\bin;D:\Tomcat-5.5.15\common\li
b;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0;

i'm am having the same problem using tomcat 5.5.17
system: SunOS motherlode 5.9 Generic_118558-14 sun4u sparc SUNW,Sun-Fire-480R

i built the native library according to directions and created libservice.a

catalina.out log file message:
The Apache Tomcat Native library which allows optimal performance in produ
ction environments was not found on the java.library.path: /opt/tomcat9/bin/jsvc
-src/native:/opt/tomcat9/bin

ls /opt/tomcat9/bin/jsvc-src/native/*a
libservice.a           thanks rkambic@ucar.edu
